title: X and Y sequences 1: Definition and recurrence laws

blocks.name: crmx
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the Robertson-Matiyasevich X sequence.
blocks.origin: const class crmx { rmX }

blocks.name: diff.crmx.s
diff.crmx.c
diff.crmx.w
crmy
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the Robertson-Matiyasevich Y sequence.
blocks.origin: const class crmy { rmY }

blocks.name: diff.crmy.s
diff.crmy.c
diff.crmy.w
df-rmx
blocks.content: Define the X sequence as the rational part of some solution of a special Pell equation. See ~ frmx and ~ rmxyval for a more useful but non-eliminable definition. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: df-rmy
blocks.content: Define the X sequence as the irrational part of some solution of a special Pell equation. See ~ frmy and ~ rmxyval for a more useful but non-eliminable definition. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: rmxfval
blocks.content: Value of the X sequence. Not used after ~ rmxyval is proved. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rmxfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, crmx, c1), cfv(c1st, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, crmx, c1), cfv(c1st, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(cuz, nat2), c1, cz, crmx, cfv(c1st, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1))), cfv(c1st, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  fveq2d(c1st, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, cv(hs1))), cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  fveq12d(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, cv(hs1)), ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))))))
  cnveqd(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpteq2dv(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqan12d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, cv(hs1), co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), c0, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fvoveq1d(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1, co(c0, cexp, nat2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cexp, nat2)
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  df-rmx(hs0, hs1, s0)
  fvex(c1st, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, nat2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c1st, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cuz, nat2))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c1st, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rmyfval
blocks.content: Value of the Y sequence. Not used after ~ rmxyval is proved. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rmyfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, crmy, c1), cfv(c2nd, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1)))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, crmy, c1), cfv(c2nd, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(cuz, nat2), c1, cz, crmy, cfv(c2nd, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1))), cfv(c2nd, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  fveq2d(c2nd, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, cv(hs1))), cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  fveq12d(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, cv(hs1)), ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))))))
  cnveqd(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpteq2dv(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  oveq1d(cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqan12d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, cv(hs1), co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), c0, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fvoveq1d(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1, co(c0, cexp, nat2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cexp, nat2)
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  df-rmy(hs0, hs1, s0)
  fvex(c2nd, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, nat2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c2nd, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cuz, nat2))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c2nd, cfv(ccnv(cmpt(s0, cxp(cn0, cz), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))), co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)

blocks.name: rmspecsqrtnq
blocks.content: The discriminant used to define the X and Y sequences has an irrational square root. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 2-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm rmspecsqrtnq(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cdif(cc, cq)))
} = {
  eldifd(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cc, cq, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  sqrtcld(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  subcl(co(c0, cexp, nat2), nat1)
  syl22anc(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wn(wcel(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cq)), wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), cn0), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn0), wbr(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), clt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), wbr(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), clt, co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cexp, nat2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), cn0), wcel(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cn))
  nnm1nn0(co(c0, cexp, nat2))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn0), wcel(c0, cn))
  nnm1nn0(c0)
  eqbrtrd(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), clt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cmin, nat1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cexp, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc))
  binom2sub1(c0)
  subsubd(co(c0, cexp, nat2), co(nat2, cmul, c0), nat1, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  sqcld(c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  mulcld(nat2, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ltsub2dd(co(c0, cexp, nat2), co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cmin, nat1), nat1, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  resubcld(co(nat2, cmul, c0), nat1, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  remulcld(nat2, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(nat2, cr))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cmin, nat1)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), clt, co(nat2, cmul, c0)))
  lt2addmuld(nat1, nat1, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  eluz2gt1(c0)
  ltaddsubd(nat1, nat1, co(nat2, cmul, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  1red(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cr), wcel(nat2, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  2re()
  eluzelre(c0, nat2)
  remulcl(nat2, c0)
  breqtrrd(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), clt, co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cexp, nat2), co(c0, cexp, nat2), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  ltm1d(co(c0, cexp, nat2), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  nnred(co(c0, cexp, nat2), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  nnsqcld(c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  eluz2nn(c0)
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cexp, nat2, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c0), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))

  ax-1cn()

blocks.name: rmspecnonsq
blocks.content: The discriminant used to define the X and Y sequences is a nonsquare positive integer and thus a valid Pell equation discriminant. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rmspecnonsq(class c0) {

  1zzd(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))

  syl5eqbrr(nat1, clt, co(c0, cexp, nat2), co(nat1, cexp, nat2), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  sq1()
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wbr(co(nat1, cexp, nat2), clt, co(c0, cexp, nat2)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  eluz2b2(c0)
  lt2sqd(nat1, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wbr(nat0, cle, nat1))
  0le1()
  nn0ge0d(c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  eluzge2nn0(c0)
  posdifd(nat1, co(c0, cexp, nat2), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))

  resqcld(c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))

  intnand(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), cn), wcel(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cq))
  eldifbd(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cq, cc, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  rmspecsqrtnq(c0)
  bitr2i(wa(wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), cn), wcel(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cq)), wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), csquarenn), wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), crab(hs0, cn, wcel(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cq))))
  eleq2i(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), csquarenn, crab(hs0, cn, wcel(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cq)))
  df-squarenn(hs0)

blocks.name: qirropth
blocks.content: This lemma implements the concept of "equate rational and irrational parts", used to prove many arithmetical properties of the X and Y sequences. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: rmxyelqirr
blocks.content: The solutions used to construct the X and Y sequences are quadratic irrationals. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.)

thm rmxyelqirr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  sseldd(co(co(c0, caddc, cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1))), cexp, c1), cab(s0, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cv(s2))))))), cfv(cpell14qr, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  eqsstrd(cfv(cpell14qr, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cab(s0, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cv(s2))))))), crab(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(co(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cmin, nat1), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1))))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))

blocks.name: rmxypairf1o
blocks.content: The function used to extract rational and irrational parts in ~ df-rmx and ~ df-rmy in fact achieves a one-to-one mapping from the quadratic irrationals to pairs of integers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: rmxynorm
blocks.content: The X and Y sequences define a solution to the corresponding Pell equation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Sep-2014.)

thm rmxynorm(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)→(((c0[rmX]c1)[^]2)[-](((c0[^]2)[-]1)[×]((c0[rmY]c1)[^]2)))= 1)
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), (((c0[rmX]c1)[^]2)[-](((c0[^]2)[-]1)[×]((c0[rmY]c1)[^]2)))= 1, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,((c0[rmX]c1)=(c0[rmX]hs0)∧(c0[rmY]c1)=(c0[rmY]hs0))))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,((c0[rmX]c1)=(c0[rmX]hs0)∧(c0[rmY]c1)=(c0[rmY]hs0))), c1 ∈ ℤ, ((c0[rmX]c1)=(c0[rmX]c1)∧(c0[rmY]c1)=(c0[rmY]c1)))
  simpr(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), c1 ∈ ℤ)
  anim12i(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), c1 ∈ ℤ, (c0[rmX]c1)=(c0[rmX]c1), (c0[rmY]c1)=(c0[rmY]c1))
  eqidd((c0[rmX]c1), c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2))
  eqidd((c0[rmY]c1), c1 ∈ ℤ)
  rspcev(hs0, c1, cz, ((c0[rmX]c1)=(c0[rmX]c1)∧(c0[rmY]c1)=(c0[rmY]c1)), ((c0[rmX]c1)=(c0[rmX]hs0)∧(c0[rmY]c1)=(c0[rmY]hs0)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, (c0[rmX]c1)=(c0[rmX]hs0), (c0[rmY]c1)=(c0[rmY]hs0), (c0[rmX]c1)=(c0[rmX]c1), (c0[rmY]c1)=(c0[rmY]c1))
  eqeq2d((c0[rmX]c1), (c0[rmX]hs0), (c0[rmX]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, crmx)
  eqeq2d((c0[rmY]c1), (c0[rmY]hs0), (c0[rmY]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, crmy)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), ((((c0[rmX]c1)[^]2)[-](((c0[^]2)[-]1)[×]((c0[rmY]c1)[^]2)))= 1 ↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,((c0[rmX]c1)=(c0[rmX]hs0)∧(c0[rmY]c1)=(c0[rmY]hs0)))), c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), (c0[rmX]c1)∈ ℕ0, (c0[rmY]c1)∈ ℤ)
  simpl(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), c1 ∈ ℤ)
  fovcl(c0, (ℤ≥ ` 2), c1, cz, crmx, cn0)
  frmx()
  fovcl(c0, (ℤ≥ ` 2), c1, cz, crmy, cz)
  frmy()
  rmxycomplete(hs0, c0, (c0[rmX]c1), (c0[rmY]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0[rmX]c1)=(c0[rmX]c1)∧(c0[rmY]c1)=(c0[rmY]c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[rmX]c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[rmY]c1))
}

blocks.name: rmbaserp
blocks.content: The base of exponentiation for the X and Y sequences is a positive real. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: rmxyneg
blocks.content: Negation law for X and Y sequences. JonesMatijasevic is inconsistent on whether the X and Y sequences have domain ` NN0 ` or ` ZZ ` ; we use ` ZZ ` consistently to avoid the need for a separate subtraction law. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: rmxneg
blocks.content: Negation law (even function) for the X sequence. The method of proof used for the previous four theorems ~ rmxyneg , ~ rmxyadd , ~ rmxy0 , and ~ rmxy1 via ~ qirropth results in two theorems at once, but typical use requires only one, so this group of theorems serves to separate the cases. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: rmyluc
blocks.content: The Y sequence is a Lucas sequence, definable via this second-order recurrence with ~ rmy0 and ~ rmy1 . Part 3 of equation 2.12 of [JonesMatijasevic] p. 695. JonesMatijasevic uses this theorem to redefine the X and Y sequences to have domain ` ( ZZ X. ZZ ) ` , which simplifies some later theorems. It may shorten the derivation to use this as our initial definition. Incidentally, the X sequence satisfies the exact same recurrence. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rmyluc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, crmy, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), cmin, co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))
} = {
  addcan2ad(co(c0, crmy, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), cmin, co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  zcnd(co(c0, crmy, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, crmy, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cz), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cz))
  peano2z(c1)
  fovcl(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2), co(c1, caddc, nat1), cz, crmy, cz)
  subcld(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, crmy, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), caddc, co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), cmin, co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), caddc, co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), co(co(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(c0, crmx, c1)), caddc, co(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), cmin, co(c0, crmx, c1))), co(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  oveq12d(co(c0, crmy, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), caddc, co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(c0, crmx, c1)), co(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), cmin, co(c0, crmx, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  rmyp1(c0, c1)
  rmym1(c0, c1)
  ppncand(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), co(c0, crmx, c1), co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  nn0cnd(co(c0, crmx, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  fovcl(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2), c1, cz, crmx, cn0)
  frmx()
  eqtr2d(co(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), cmin, co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), caddc, co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1))), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  npcand(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wcel(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), cc))
  2cn()
  mulcl(nat2, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0))
  zcnd(co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1)), cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cz))
  peano2zm(c1)
  fovcl(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2), co(c1, cmin, nat1), cz, crmy, cz)
  2timesd(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  mulcld(co(c0, crmy, c1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  zcnd(co(c0, crmy, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  fovcl(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2), c1, cz, crmy, cz)
  frmy()
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cc))
  eluzelcn(c0, nat2)
}

blocks.origin:
thm rmyluc2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, crmy, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)), cmin, co(c0, crmy, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))))

  eqtr4d(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0)), co(co(nat2, cmul, c0), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)), co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  oveq2d(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, c0), co(c0, cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  mulcomd(co(c0, crmy, c1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))

blocks.content: "Double-angle formula" for X-values. Equation 2.13 of [JonesMatijasevic] p. 695. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rmxdbl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, crmx, co(nat2, cmul, c1)), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cexp, nat2)), cmin, nat1)))

  2timesd(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cc))

blocks.name: rmydbl
blocks.content: "Double-angle formula" for Y-values. Equation 2.14 of [JonesMatijasevic] p. 695. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rmydbl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, crmy, co(nat2, cmul, c1)), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, crmx, c1)), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1))))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, crmy, co(nat2, cmul, c1)), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, crmx, c1)), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)), co(c0, crmy, co(c1, caddc, c1)), co(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmx, c1)), caddc, co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))

  2timesd(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
  3anidm23(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(c0, crmy, co(c1, caddc, c1)), co(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmx, c1)), caddc, co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)))))
  rmyadd(c0, c1, c1)
  3eqtrrd(co(co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmx, c1)), caddc, co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1))), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, crmx, c1)), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1))), co(co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)), caddc, co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  mulassd(nat2, co(c0, crmx, c1), co(c0, crmy, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  2cnd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  2timesd(co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  mulcld(co(c0, crmx, c1), co(c0, crmy, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)), caddc, co(co(c0, crmx, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmy, c1)), co(co(c0, crmy, c1), cmul, co(c0, crmx, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  mulcomd(co(c0, crmx, c1), co(c0, crmy, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  nn0cnd(co(c0, crmx, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  fovcl(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2), c1, cz, crmx, cn0)
  frmx()
  zcnd(co(c0, crmy, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, cz)))
  fovcl(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2), c1, cz, crmy, cz)

}
